CustomField.description: SOQL query for records to be shown in the table. The only allowed binded variable is 'quoteId' (e.g. WHERE QuoteId=:quoteId). Do NOT include spaces between field API names (e.g. SELECT Id,Test__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SOQL query for records to be shown in the table. The only allowed binded variable is 'quoteId' (e.g. WHERE QuoteId=:quoteId). Do NOT include spaces between field API names (e.g. SELECT Id,Test__c)
CustomField.label: Record Table Query
